effect.canMakeMonstersUndefeatable: can make monsters undefeatable for specefic rounds
effect.canAddFieldSpellFromDeck: can add field spell from deck to hand
effect.negateTrap: will negate a trap with destructive effect
effect.equipBasedMyUpMonsters: equip a monster based on monsters you control
effect.canDrawACardWhenAMonsterIsDead: can draw a card each time a monster is dead
effect.canControlOpponentMonster: can control opponent monster for one round
effect.monstersCanNotAttack: Monsters with higher atk can not attack
effect.fieldATKIncreaseGY2: increase by number of cards in GY
effect.canChangeFaceOFOpponent: can face-up all the face-down monsters
effect.canDestroyOpponentSpellAndTrap: can destroy opponent spell and trap
effect.canAddFromDeckToHand: can add cards from deck to hand
effect.fieldATKIncreaseGY1: increase by number of cards in GY
effect.getLPForEverySpellActivation: gets LP for every spell activation
effect.equipBasedOnPosition: equip a card based on its position
effect.canSummonFromGY: can summon a card from bothGY
effect.discardACardToActivate: discards a card to get activated
